Definition.WordDefinition: Hometown, IL (city, FIPS 35866) Location: 41.73223 N, 87.73125 W Population (1990): 4769 (1951 housing units) Area: 1.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 60456 Hometown, PA (CDP, FIPS 35448) Location: 40.82203 N, 75.98600 W Population (1990): 1545 (590 housing units) Area: 5.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: hometown \hometown\, home town \home town\n. the town (or city) where a person was born or grew up or has his principal residence; as, he never went back to his hometown again. [WordNet 1.5]

Definition.WordDefinition: hometown \hometown\, home town \home town\n. the town (or city) where a person was born or grew up or has his principal residence; as, he never went back to his hometown again. [WordNet 1.5]
hometown n : the town (or city) where you grew up or where you have your principal residence; "he never went back to his hometown again"
